thread.title: News24 article leads to fraud ring bust
thread.title_full: News24 article leads to fraud ring bust | News24

author: news24.com
title: News24 article leads to fraud ring bust
text:
Durban - A group of men thought to be behind a tanzanite fraud syndicate were bust in police sting on Durban’s beach front on Monday.
Their potential victim had read about a similar syndicate on News24 and contacted a city private investigator who was dealing with the dossier of cases.
PI Sean Peirce said the victim read the stories on News24 and then approached him.
"He said that this same lot had scammed him out of R10 000 six years ago and then messed up and contacted him again to offer him the same deal. He got me involved and then played along,” Peirce said.
